text: Vishal Film Factory is an Indian film production, distribution and music company established by actor Vishal in 2013. Based in Chennai, it mainly produces and distributes Tamil films. It releases music on V-Music. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Key | style="background:#FFFFCC;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} ;As producer {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !
